Full Description: At Community Phone, we offer simple, reliable landline phone service for homes and businesses. Our phone service does not require internet, and works during power outages. Simply plug the device into an outlet, plug your phone into the base, and enjoy unlimited local and long distance calls in the US. We also give you full control over how you use your phone. Transfer your landline number onto a cell phone, or forward calls from a landline and get rid of your existing service completely. Have calls ring on multiple phones at the same time, or route calls to different phones based on a custom dial menu. Send voicemail recordings to your inbox. Description: SaaS Subscription and Payment Optimization Platform
Full Description: Revolv3’s unique platform drives incremental profits for merchants by maximizing cards on file settlement rates for recurring transactions while minimizing transaction attempts, thus eliminating additional transaction fees. Revolv3’s platform is a simpler, more agile solution for merchants offering subscriptions. It encourages approvals by minimizing the incentive for multiple transaction attempts, so the merchant is only charged for successful charge attempts, never failures. The platform maximizes payment captures by identifying and analyzing data used by each bank card processor and issuer in real-time to optimize recurring and recycled attempts, resulting in improved approval rates by as much as 14%. For developers, Revolv3’s machine learning backend is easily configurable within the platform via the portal or the APIs and is designed for customization and granularity necessary to efficiently manage subscription billing and support ecommerce merchants as they scale and optimize.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Los Angeles Area, West Coast, Western US

Full Description: Project Vesta is a non-profit working to galvanize the science of coastal enhanced weathering through accelerating one of  the earth's natural processes of carbon sequestration, the carbonate–silicate cycle. This works by spreading olivine sand in coastal areas, where it removes CO2 from the atmosphere. Project Vesta is bringing 30 years of science to be tested in the real world - harnessing the power of the ocean to permanently sequester carbon - at under $20 per ton at scale.

We use a unique, physician-first approach process that is simple, with no extra clicks in the EHR, and no external program or app to access. The switches are straightforward, easy to make, and the entire process stays within the normal clinical workflow. The platform is PBM compatible because it helps physicians take advantage of the PBM’s hard work by giving them the best, lowest cost options for their patients. Our unique process optimizes the formulary, effectively creating guardrails to guide physicians’ prescribing behavior and lower direct drug costs for patients and overall drug spend for health plans and employers. The platform is complementary to existing pharmacy initiatives and works with PBMs to optimize results. The platform is fully scalable and customizable to each client’s unique variables and formularies.

Description: Mobile data and analytics platform that delivers data and insights to succeed in a data driven economy.
Full Description: Fivvy tackles the pressing issue of dwindling competitiveness and profitability among companies in today's highly saturated markets. Our core problem identification stems from the realization that businesses often grapple with understanding their customers' behaviors and preferences, resulting in ineffective strategies for upselling, cross-selling, and personalization. This gap not only leads to suboptimal revenue growth but also contributes to a decline in marketing ROI, as companies deploy generic marketing efforts without the support of deep, insightful data, culminating in lower conversion rates and unnecessary ad spend. Furthermore, the absence of precise competitive intelligence hinders firms from making strategic pivots and innovations, causing them to lose market share and experience slower growth. Fivvy's innovative solution, the Contextual Profiler, empowers businesses with real-time, exact customer and market intelligence by embedding our technology into mobile apps to provide a comprehensive metadata analysis. This analysis unveils crucial trends, user engagement patterns, and a detailed competitive landscape. By informing businesses about which apps their users have and their usage durations, Fivvy provides unparalleled insights into user behavior and lifestyle preferences, thereby enabling actionable strategies for competitive advantage, user experience optimization, and sustainable growth. In essence, Fivvy is revolutionizing how companies understand their customers and the competitive environment, facilitating a data-driven approach to enhance customer profitability and secure a strategic competitive edge. Our mission is to transform data intelligence into actionable insights, allowing businesses of all sizes to not only navigate but thrive in the data-driven world, optimizing their market position and unlocking new avenues for revenue generation.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Miami Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Design, Financial Services, Information Technology, Mobile, Sales and Marketing
Top 5 Investors: Globant Ventures, EndeavorLAB

Description: Bolt Labs - building secure digital asset management systems and privacy-enhancing technology for everyone
Full Description: Our mission at Bolt Labs is to build a usable, secure, and scalable infrastructure to enable everyone to securely store their assets while preserving the privacy of their transactions. Bolt’s secure computation solutions (or MPC) allow you to protect your user’s assets while providing confidentiality, ensuring integrity, and preventing misuse or theft. A technology that is fast becoming the standard for digital asset security, MPC enables these benefits by federating trust across multiple parties and allowing evaluation of functions without decrypting private inputs.  Bolt is also developing the zkChannels L2 protocol - a scalable and usable privacy-preserving payment infrastructure that integrates with existing payment networks, including but not limited to public blockchains. We believe zkChannels will set a new standard for secure payments in online services, giving merchants a seamless way to comply with emerging privacy regulations and delight their customers with cryptographically rigorous respect for their privacy. The company was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Baltimore, Maryland.

Description: PHYTunes is a Palo Alto, CA based deep tech company focused on improving High Frequency 5G, 6G and Wi-Fi 6 coverage inside of buildings.
Full Description: PHYTunes is a Palo Alto, CA based deep tech company focused on improving High Frequency 5G, 6G and Wi-Fi 6 coverage inside of buildings.  High Bandwidth mobile networks require high frequency, and high frequency signals do not propagate well through barriers such as walls, tinted windows and other building materials.  PHYTunes has addressed this critical problem by developing a wireless-wireline convergence solution that enables propagation of mid-band and mmWave 5G signals over existing in-building cabling such as cat 5, cat 6, and coax at a fraction of the cost of existing solutions.  PHYTunes leverages this same technology to efficiently increase 5Ghz (and above) Wi-Fi coverage with a stable, secure single frequency signal throughout the building.   These solutions allow for easy and fast deployments and breakdown the barriers to high bandwidth, low latency mobile communications.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Hardware
Founders: Akula Aneesh Reddy, Jisung Oh, Michael McLaren, Michael Nathan
Top 5 Investors: Quake Capital Partners, National Science Foundation, Bosch Ventures, Draper University Ventures, Hubraum

Description: Arrow AI provides channel browsing, content sharing, post boosting, SaaS, tools, and social media marketing services.
Full Description: Our mission is to make digital ads work for everyone and save small businesses $38BN a year. We are a C-Corporation incorporated under the name Custom Social Inc., in the state of Delaware in 2019. The Company’s principal product is Arrow Boost, a browser extension that uses Artificial Intelligence to help Small Businesses market themselves more effectively on Facebook.  Our Mission is to make digital advertising work for everyone, everywhere.  What we do is build effective, easy-to-use, and affordable digital advertising tools for millions of Small Businesses and “solopreneurs”. Small Businesses are being “left behind” when it comes to digital advertising and are often underserved by agencies and enterprise platforms built for larger companies. We believe that when small businesses win, we all win.     Our business model is self-serve SaaS tools that are high value, affordable, and integrate seamlessly into major advertising platforms. We charge $9 per month per user for Arrow Boost.  Our products are end-to-end self-serve, do not require a sales team or staff for onboarding.  The user simply downloads the extension from the Google Chrome store, installs it, and starts using it right away.  We offer instructional videos, FAQs, and limited online chat support.     The company plans to build a suite of browser extensions so small businesses can find their potential customers everywhere in the digital advertising ecosystem: Pinterest, Connected TV like Roku, Tik-Tok, Snapchat, and other digital channels.

Description: We are expand navigable roadways for autonomous vehicles from 3% to 95%, today, by equipping each car with our onboard vision hardware.
Full Description: Only 3% of US roadways are covered by the high-definition master maps that today's self-driving cars require to navigate. Without a hard tether to these maps, or beyond their bounds, autonomous vehicles simply cannot operate. Worse, the coverage of these maps is expanding at a rate of only 2% every 5 years. At Hyperspec AI we are expanding navigable roadways for autonomous vehicles to 95%, today, by equipping each car with our onboard vision hardware that localizes and navigates with true autonomy. Our high-frequency periodic calibration corrects for drift using satellite imagery to achieve continuous precise real-time positioning at a fraction of the cost. Hyperspec AI is my third company and the second to focus on mapping and localization for autonomous vehicles. I am a serial entrepreneur with successful exits and the deep domain expertise required to lead this new generation of navigation technology. Today, my team includes top talent in computer vision, simulation, and high-performance edge computing. With $860K raised and $750K in revenue booked to date with a $1.2M backlog, we have traction and momentum. Our focus is on partnership opportunities that accelerate our time-to-market to meet the immediate industry demand.

Description: SquareML is a no-code machine learning platform established in 2021, headquartered in New Jersey.
Full Description: SquareML is a no-code machine learning platform established in 2021, headquartered in New Jersey. The company caters to clients from various regions, including North America, the UK, India, and the Caribbean. SquareML specializes in the ingestion of data from multiple healthcare sources, involving the collection, cleansing, integration, and organization of information from electronic health records, claims databases, medical devices, Health Information Exchanges, unstructured data and more. The solutions offered by SquareML encompass a range of applications, such as Readmissions, Fall, Chronic Disease Prediction, Risk Stratification, Digitizing Patient Health Records, Natural Language Processing solutions, Telehealth solutions, and more. By structuring its operations across three interconnected layers, SquareML is able to facilitate the seamless flow of healthcare data, advanced processing, and meaningful presentation of insights, ultimately contributing to improved decision-making and better patient outcomes.  SquareML addresses a fundamental challenge in healthcare data management by streamlining the complex process of ingesting, cleansing, integrating, and organizing information from diverse sources. By employing advanced machine learning techniques, SquareML enables the extraction of meaningful insights from healthcare data. Ultimately, SquareML contributes to improved decision-making in healthcare, leading to better patient outcomes. The platform's no-code machine learning capabilities empower users to navigate the intricate landscape of healthcare data without the need for extensive technical expertise, making it a versatile solution for healthcare organizations.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US

Description: Elythea is a machine learning platform to predict and prevent avoidable pregnancy complications.
Full Description: Elythea is an ML/DL-driven platform that obstetricians in any setting use to predict risk for complications of pregnancy (postpartum hemorrhage, c-section, eclampsia) before they ever happen. We use information that is available at the point of care, so we can make the prediction as early as the 1st trimester, allowing doctors months to prepare in advance! We use clinical history/demographic information that is available at the point-of-care, so we can make the prediction as early as the 1st trimester, in developed or developing countries, allowing doctors months to prepare in advance!  Knowing high-risk earlier allows for blood/medicine/tailored clinical guidance to be prepared, reducing mortality/costs >90%. Our models use proprietary models to surpass gold standard risk assessments in the current clinical space. Our preliminary clinical trials have demonstrated 3x greater sensitivity for high risk classification of hemorrhage when comapred to the current widely used hemorrhage assessment score.

While some green cleaners are safer, they just don’t work as well. We believe clean ingredients shouldn’t mean sacrificing performance. Determined to find a smarter way to clean, we turned to nature for inspiration. By using cutting-edge bioenzymes and emerging green chemistry, we’re reimagining cleaning—from the dirt up. Our mission is to innovate in green chemistry for a cleaner, safer world.

Description: VeraDermics is a dermatology company that creates novel drug delivery mechanisms for a pain-free cure for skin conditions such as warts.
Full Description: VeraDermics is a dermatology company that creates novel drug delivery mechanisms for a pain-free cure for skin conditions such as warts. It offers a dissolvable microneedle patch solution that administers immunotherapy without any pain, a treatment that stimulates the body’s own immune system to fight off the wart virus. The patch is applied like a bandage and remains on the skin for less than an hour. During that time, the microneedles, which are composed of the immune stimulators in a sustained-release polymer matrix, dissolve from the adhesive backing and are implanted into the skin. The adhesive can then be removed, leaving the microneedles to dissolve in the skin over the next few weeks. During that time, immune stimulators are steadily released directly into the wart.

Description: Dozera AI is an AI research and deployment company that conducts research and implements machine learning.
Full Description: Dozera AI: Pioneering AI Research and Deployment Company Founded by Gursharn Arya in 2020 Dozera ai In the fast-paced world of artificial intelligence, Dozera AI has emerged as a groundbreaking research and deployment company. Founded in 2020 by Gursharn Arya, the company has quickly established itself as a key player in the field of machine learning. Leveraging cutting-edge technologies and a team of talented experts, Dozera AI is at the forefront of developing innovative AI solutions that drive progress and transformation across various industries. Founding and Vision: Dozera AI was established in 2020 by Gursharn Arya, a visionary entrepreneur with a passion for artificial intelligence. Recognizing the immense potential of AI to revolutionize industries and improve everyday lives, Arya set out to create a company that would spearhead advancements in the field. With a strong focus on research and development, Dozera AI aims to build intelligent systems capable of solving complex problems and augmenting human capabilities. Research and Development: At the heart of Dozera AI lies its robust research and development department. The company's talented team of data scientists, engineers, and researchers collaborates to push the boundaries of AI technologies. By conducting in-depth research and staying up-to-date with the latest advancements, Dozera AI ensures that it remains at the forefront of the rapidly evolving AI landscape. The company's research efforts encompass various domains, including natural language processing, computer vision, deep learning, and reinforcement learning. By exploring these areas, Dozera AI develops state-of-the-art algorithms and models that power its cutting-edge solutions. This research-driven approach allows the company to tackle complex challenges and provide innovative solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of its clients. Deployment of AI Solutions: Dozera AI doesn't limit its efforts to research alone. The company takes pride in its ability to deploy AI solutions that have a tangible impact on businesses and society. Leveraging its expertise in machine learning and data analysis, Dozera AI offers a range of services, including predictive analytics, intelligent automation, and personalized recommendation systems. By collaborating closely with clients, Dozera AI ensures a deep understanding of their specific requirements and challenges. This client-centric approach enables the company to develop tailored solutions that address key pain points and unlock new opportunities for growth. Through the deployment of AI solutions, Dozera AI empowers businesses to make data-driven decisions, optimize processes, and enhance overall efficiency. Industry Applications: Dozera AI's versatile solutions find applications in a wide array of industries. From healthcare and finance to manufacturing and retail, the company's AI technologies provide valuable insights and enable businesses to gain a competitive edge. For example, in healthcare, Dozera AI's predictive analytics models can assist in disease diagnosis and prognosis, while in finance, the company's algorithms facilitate fraud detection and risk management. Ethics and Transparency: As AI continues to permeate various aspects of society, Dozera AI places utmost importance on ethical considerations and transparency. The company adheres to rigorous ethical guidelines in the development and deployment of AI systems, ensuring fairness, accountability, and privacy protection. By fostering trust and transparency, Dozera AI aims to alleviate concerns and facilitate responsible AI adoption. Conclusion: Dozera AI, founded by Gursharn Arya in 2020, has rapidly emerged as a leading AI research and deployment company. With a focus on cutting-edge research and development, Dozera AI leverages the power of machine learning to develop innovative solutions across industries. By combining expertise, ethical considerations, and a commitment to transparency, Dozera AI is poised to continue pushing the boundaries of AI and shape a future where intelligent systems augment human capabilities for the betterment of society.

Description: Ōmcare is a digital health company pioneering a customizable, home health platform and promises right medication, right time, right person.
Full Description: Ōmcare is a digital health company pioneering an open access, home health platform that allows healthcare organizations to extend care into the home via a secure telehealth infrastructure and integration with our patented medication dispensing technology. Ōmcare enables remote delivery of wrap around care coordination and integration of existing virtual care and remote patient care solutions and promising real medication adherence defined as right med, right time, right person.  Ōmcare allows healthcare organizations to rapidly deploy a home care strategy, customized to your brand and patient needs. The product’s open architecture also allows for the integration of provider and consumer tools accelerating deployment and keeping the focus on patient outcomes. Whether it’s driving additional revenue, creating better experiences, reducing operating costs, or improving the health of the end-users, Ōmcare can be deployed either broadly at a certain market or more tactically at a specific subset of a membership group. Initial targets include the rapidly aging, complex chronic and dual populations.
